title: Since past few days i cant see the times or what type of game my friends are in
body:
So when i go to my friends list and i see people are in game and when you highlight the little banner usually pops up with the game they're in if its ranked or not and how long they have been in game already for. 

well for me that banner doesnt pop up anymore when i highlight over my friends for any that are simple online or the ones that are already in game. 


I heard there was a fix for the time and date but my date and time are exactly right and i have never had a problem like this ever since ive played league. anybody having a similar issue or know how i can fix it?

replies.body: The mouseover banner seems to be disabled currently, and is known by the devs.  I don't have any info or context other than that for now, though.  Hopefully it will make a comeback in no time!
Thanks for the reply I thought my client was messed up for sure glad to know its not on my end. again many thanks for the info.
